testcase.name: test

error.message: ### Error querying database. Cause: java.sql.SQLNonTransientConnectionException: Could not create connection to database server. Attempted reconnect 3 times. Giving up. ### The error may exist in com/wdk/mapping/MenuMapper.xml ### The error may involve com.wdk.dao.MenuDao.selectMenu ### The error occurred while executing a query ### Cause: java.sql.SQLNonTransientConnectionException: Could not create connection to database server. Attempted reconnect 3 times. Giving up.
